name: SparseOpaqueFactorization_Double
desc: A structure that represents the factorization of a matrix of double-precision, floating-point values.

items.name: init(status: SparseStatus_t, attributes: SparseAttributes_t, symbolicFactorization: SparseOpaqueSymbolicFactorization, userFactorStorage: Bool, numericFactorization: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?, solveWorkspaceRequiredStatic: Int, solveWorkspaceRequiredPerRHS: Int)
items.desc: Creates a new opaque factorization with the specified parameters.

items.name: var attributes: SparseAttributes_t
items.desc: The attributes of a factorization object.

items.name: var numericFactorization: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?
items.desc: The pointer to a private internal representation of a numeric factor.

items.name: var solveWorkspaceRequiredPerRHS: Int
items.desc: The required size of the per-right-hand-side workspace for a call to a sparse solve function.

items.name: var solveWorkspaceRequiredStatic: Int
items.desc: The required size of the static workspace for a call to a sparse solve function.

items.name: var status: SparseStatus_t
items.desc: The status of the factorization object.

items.name: var symbolicFactorization: SparseOpaqueSymbolicFactorization
items.desc: The symbolic factorization that this numeric factorization depends on.

items.name: var userFactorStorage: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether user-provided storage backs this object.
